fields_of_interest: Budget, Trade, Education and training, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Mainly Horizon Europe, H2020, the ECSEL JU, IPCEI on microelectronics, Quantum computing, photonics, and Industry 4.0 initiatives.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Several projects in the ECSEL JU.
goals__remit:
ASML is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of chip-making equipment. Our vision is to enable affordable microelectronics that improve the quality of life.  
 
To achieve this, our mission is to invent, develop, manufacture and service advanced technology for high-tech lithography, metrology and software solutions for the semiconductor industry.  
 
ASML's guiding principle is continuing Moore's Law towards ever smaller, cheaper, more powerful and energy-efficient semiconductors. This results in increasingly powerful and capable electronics that enable the world to progress within a multitude of fields, including healthcare, communications, energy, mobility, and entertainment.
